WorkItem.Description:
Chirpy is a beautiful addition to my solution so far. Well done indeed!

It will be a useful to specify "$(SolutionDir)\path" in the file or folder elements below instead of "..\..\..\..\path"

    <FileGroup Name="some-1.0.0.js">
        <File Path="..\..\..\..\path\sub\some.js" Minify="false" />
        <File Path="..\..\..\..\path\events\another.js" Minify="false" />
   </FileGroup>
WorkItem.Summary: Ability to specify VS Macros (e.g. $(SolutionDir)) in config
